bug_report.summary: An informative error message is not displayed on the registration page after entering invalid data.
bug_report.STR: 1. Open the site: https://example.com 2. Open the registration page. 3. Enter invalid data into the required fields (e-mail without domain and three character password instead of six). 4. Pay attention to the lack of informative error messages.
bug_report.AR: An informative message is not displayed on the registration page after entering invalid data.
bug_report.ER: An error message is shown to the visitor after entering invalid data into the required fields.
